name: Base Breacher
description:
Made for the 2022 fireside jam.

Destroy a base that is being Protected.

I procrastinated, so the level design sucks and it is pretty unpolished.

Controls

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim and Shoot

Credits:

Programing: Mrtubagames

Art: Toast Studio

Music: https://stevenmelin.itch.io/16-bit-action-music-pack

Font: https://www.dafont.com/upheaval.font
